text:
I still don't see any implication of a bug in httpd. 

If you can't get your php code to work in Apache, it's not something you can get support for in ASF bugzilla.  I'd suggest a more explicit testcase and asking for help on users@httpd.apache.org or stackoverflow if you're stuck.   

If by some chance a meaningful investigation ends up in a httpd bug report, re-open here with concrete details.

(What's the relationship to popen and CGI and why would you move exim into your documentroot? The HTTP Server project won't sort this out for you)
